# allParameters

**Instance Property**

Returns a flat array of all parameters in the group, including those in child groups.

## Declaration

```swift
var allParameters: [AUParameter] { get }
```

## Obtaining Group Parameters

- **children**: The group’s child nodes.
title: allParameters
